thread.title: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20
thread.title_full: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20

title: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20
text:
> Entertainment Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20 This CD cover image released by Columbia Records shows "25," the latest release by Adele. The album will be released on Nov. 20. (Columbia via AP)
